content: Hoho, let's celebrate <style=Highlight>tomorrow</style> when your new home is complete! <style=SizeSmall>We can start planning for the new shop and Starsea Voyages too, hoho~!</style>

content: <style=SizeBig>Congratulations</style>, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>! Now you have your very first house!
